title: Ultimate Music Bundle - Game Music - Background Music - Music - Music Loops
description: Get Our Entire Music Library of 113 tracks (12 Packs 3.4GB+) Free Life Time Updates! (Fantasy Music, Game Music, Background Music, Cyberpunk Music, Synthwave Music, Retro Music, Chiptune Music, Cinematic Music, Metal Music, Rock Music, Casual Music)
longDescription:
> Listen To The Preview <


*Update 1.1 - Action Music is now included!


** Future Life Time Updates - Get all of our current and future Music Packs for only $19.99! ** (Prices will go up the more music tracks are added!)


* 100% Royalty Free - All Music Tracks Are 100% Royalty Free! Use in your Commercial Games, Videos, Streams or anything else you create!


(For Any Questions DM us on Discord)


The Music Bundle's Total size is 3.4GB And It Includes all of our music packs (113 tracks, 538 Sounds Overall):

  • 5 Exclusive Music Tracks (NEW)
  • Midlands - RPG/Fantasy Music Pack - 19.99$
  • Action Music - Thriller Music - Shooter Music - 19.99$
  • Ultimate Casual Music - 19.99$
  • Real Recorded Metal Music - 19.99$
  • Indie Game Music Collection - 19.99$
  • Cyberpunk Music - 19.99$
  • Ultimate Piano Music - 19.99$
  • Golden Age Retro Music Pack - 19.99$
  • Wizards & Dragons - Fantasy Music Pack - 19.99$
  • Casual Music Pack - 9.99$
  • OST Pro - Cinematic Music Pack - 9.99$
  • Real Pianos - Wagner Piano - 9.99$


Contact Us:

Website | Support | Discord | Youtube
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 12 Music Packs (Free Lifetime Updates)
  • 113 Premium Music Tracks
  • Professionally mixed and mastered
  • Game Ready Music
  • 44.1kHz High Quality WAVs


Number of Audio Waves: 546

Number of Audio Cues: 546

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
